value.title: Reminder - Install WebView2 to Get Latest Updates from Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: This video, is the reminder for the updating your system with WebView2 if you want to receive, Power BI Desktop updates from February 2022. value.title: Use Page Navigation Action for Button to Navigate from One Page to Another in Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, about newly introduced action type for buttons which is ‚ÄúPage Navigation‚Äù. value.title: What is Power BI Shared Datasets? How to user to develop Multiple Reports using Single Dataset?

First, we will be discussing, What is Shared Datasets, how we can develop the reports using data from the Shared Datasets and how the permission model for the Power BI Shared Datasets work.  In Power BI, Shared Dataset is a dataset

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
